artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Komatsu Wasankichi
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和五年作 {Shōwa gonen saku} (made in 1930)
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LR margin publisher\'s seal: カワグチ {Kawaguchi} LL margin: 彫前田摺小松　版権所有 {hori Maeda suri Komatsu, hanken shoyū} (carved by Maeda, printed by Komatsu, copyright)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
In the mountains above Nikko is the scenic Lake Chūzenji, a popular destination especially in autumn, as seen here, but also when the cherry blossoms are blooming in spring.
second edition published by Kawaguchi alone
title: Lake Chūzenji at Nikkō
